Head of the International Monetary Fund, 2000–2004
Köhler was appointed managing director and chairman of the executive board of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) in 2000.
Before entering the office of managing director, Köhler had spent time in Indonesia during the 1997 Asian financial crisis
